ComicInfo.Summary:
after being defeated by Judas iscariot spawn dies, but it is only the beginning of a new chapter, thus, the man of miracles gives Spawn a chance to save the world from the upcomming armageddon between heaven and hell by resurrecting him and bestowing him with new powers through the fruit of wisdom making him Godlike.
Spawn fights the ravaging horsemen of the apocolypse and griefs for whats to happen...
